titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to limit the fee a real estate broker may charge for preparing an information return in a noncommercial real estate transaction.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/12/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to set a five dollar limit on any fee that a real estate broker may charge for the preparation of required information returns in connection with residential real estate transactions.
